tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AR_health_monitoring_devices (
	sync_id INT,
	person_id INT,
	device_id INT,
	data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	heart_rate INT,
	blood_pressure INT
);

CREATE TABLE health_monitoring_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    sync_date TIMESTAMP,
    heart_rate INT,
    activity_level INT
);

CREATE TABLE wellness_insights (
    insight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    insight_description TEXT,
    recommendation TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_health_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id UUID,
    sync_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    sync_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE user_profile (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE wellness_insights (
    insight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    insight_type VARCHAR(50),
    insight_description TEXT,
    insight_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature FLOAT,
    time_stamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE health_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    heart_rate INT,
    steps_count INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    recorded_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    workout_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    calories_burned INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
